msbt.message: Hey, thanks again for the gift! I know it's really from Santa by way of Jingle.But you delivered it, and that counts for something. I won't forget it, !

Normally I get really excited about things before I get themthen I end up disappointed after I get them.But that gift you delivered to me yesterday? I'm still alllll about it. I can't stop looking at it!
Thanks again for the swag bag you gave me yesterday. I feel like a Toy Day VIP because of you!
You know what today is, right?<10_4 /> The Toy Day after-party!Thanks again for the gift yesterday. I think being sincere is coming back into fashion, so I really mean that!
I know Toy Day is over, but I can still feel the magic, !It's justbetween you and Santa you both made it so special.I-I'm not crying. I'm just using my eyeballs to moisturize my cheeks.

Is this holiday magic? I think it is!<10_4 /> I've had this warm, fuzzy feeling ever since I opened my gifts.I'm just overwhelmed with good feelings. I don't even know what hashtag could describe them
I'm so glad I ran into you before the holiday season is over. I have an important message for you. Happy holidays.<10_4 /> That was a dramatic read. Now here's - style. Happy holidaaaaays!
I knew we'd get to see each other! Even though we kinda missed each other on Toy Dayhere we are!So, uhhappy belated Toy Day, ! I hope you had a good one.
